docs.snippet: GENEVA, Dec. 13--Soviet Russia, it is now considered certain, will be thrust forth from the company of the League of Nations, having, in the opinion of her fellow-members, by her own acts placed herself outside the Covenant.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 14 --There is almost a unanimous feeling of ill will on the part of the Uruguayan public toward the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee, forced into this harbor last night after a day-long battle with three British...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 14 --There is almost a unanimous feeling of ill will on the part of the Uruguayan public toward the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee, forced into this harbor last night after a day-long battle with three British cruisers.
